title: Prevail
description: If you liked Outlander you will like this story!  After overthrowing the Empire, Jessie and the sexy gladiator, Magnus Maximus, celebrate in the streets of Rome, along with the rest of the city. However, the time to celebrate doesn't last long as Jessie is kidnapped by an Emperor's guard and she learns a dark secret that could disrupt the peace in Rome forever.  With the window of opportunity to travel back to the future closing quickly, will Jessie be able to save Magnus Maximus one last time? Will Jessie be able to get back home before the gateway closes forever? Or will she stay in Rome to stay with Magnus forever?  Read to find out!  This is the third instalment of The Gladiator's Girl series, which includes: Conquer (The Gladiator's Girl #1) Dominate (The Gladiator's Girl #2) Prevail (The Gladiator's Girl #3)   This 7k erotic romance includes steamy sexual encounters. Adult readers only!  keywords: short romance, erotic romance, historical romance, ancient world, ancient Rome
author: Violette Paradise
